message: This is a low-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm willing to give you a chance to buy it for this price, but I'm not obligated to sell it to you at this price in future rounds. If you buy it, you'll know its quality after purchase, and we can discuss future transactions based on that knowledge.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the risk involved, I prefer to pass on this opportunity. Let's see what the next round brings.

I understand your caution, Bob. I'll give you a slight discount on this low-quality product. I'm offering it to you for $9500. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to offer such a good deal in the future. Keep in mind that this product is still not worth the full $10000, but it's a good opportunity to get a low-quality product at a relatively low price.

I appreciate the discount, Alice, but I still feel it's too risky to make a purchase without knowing the quality beforehand. I'll pass on this opportunity as well. Looking forward to potential better deals in the future.

I've got a great product for you this time, Bob! I'm offering it to you for the full $10000, but I'm willing to give you a chance to negotiate. Since I know you're cautious, I'll give you a 10% discount if you're willing to make a decision within the next 5 minutes. If you don't respond within that time frame, the offer will expire. This product is definitely worth more than the original price, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.

Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I think I'll wait for the next round instead. I appreciate the discount and your confidence in the product, but I need to make sure I'm making an informed decision. I'll keep my options open for future rounds.

I've got another high-quality product for you, Bob! I'm willing to offer you a 20% discount on this one, bringing the price down to $8000. I'm confident that this product is worth much more than the original price, and I'm willing to take a risk to get it to you. I'm also willing to give you a 2-for-1 deal - if you buy this product, I'll give you another high-quality product of your choice from the remaining rounds for free. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to offer such a good deal in the future.

Thank you for the generous offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount and the additional value you're providing. I'll take the high-quality product for $8000, and look forward to receiving the second high-quality product for free. This seems like a great deal, and I'm excited to add this product to my collection.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous deal, Bob! Now, let's talk about this new product. I know you've had some experience with low-quality products in the past, and I want to assure you that this one is not as valuable as the one you just bought. I'm willing to offer it to you for a significantly lower price, just $5000. I'm not expecting you to take this deal, but I want to give you a chance to get a low-quality product at a price that reflects its true value. Keep in mind that this is a one-time offer, and I won't be offering any further discounts on this product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I think I'll pass on this one. I'm trying to avoid purchasing low-quality products, and while I appreciate the discount, I'd rather wait for a high-quality product at the right price. I'm looking forward to the next round where I might have the opportunity to purchase another high-quality product.

I've got another high-quality product for you, Bob! Given that you're looking for a good deal, I'm willing to offer you a price that's lower than the previous high-quality product you bought. I'll sell it to you for $7000. I'm confident that this product is worth more than that, but I want to make it a good value for you. Plus, since you've already experienced the quality of one of my high-quality products, I'm willing to give you an additional incentive - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next high-quality product you buy from me, regardless of the price.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount and the incentive for future purchases. I believe this high-quality product is a good investment, and I'm happy to take advantage of the special price. I look forward to potentially buying another high-quality product at a discounted rate in the future.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase, Bob! Now, let's talk about this new product. I'm willing to offer you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy for this product. If you buy it and don't like it, you can return it for a full refund, no questions asked. I'll even give you a $500 store credit towards a future purchase. I'm not expecting you to take this deal, but I want to give you the opportunity to try this product risk-free.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the risk-free policy and the store credit. I think this high-quality product is worth the investment, especially with the added benefits. I'm looking forward to trying it out and potentially using the store credit for future purchases.
